100: Comment in a paragraph
//- - - - - - - - -//
The %% quick %% brown fox jumps over the %% lazy %% dog.
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p>The  brown fox jumps over the  dog.</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//

101: Comment in an ATX heading
//- - - - - - - - -//
## This is an %%ATX%% heading
//- - - - - - - - -//
<h2>This is an  heading</h2>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//

102: Comment in a Setext heading
//- - - - - - - - -//
This is a %%Setext%% heading
-----------------------
//- - - - - - - - -//
<h2>This is a  heading</h2>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//

103: Comment in a link
//- - - - - - - - -//
[Link to %%example%% site](https://example.com)
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p><a href="https://example.com">Link to  site</a></p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//

104: Comment in an image (TODO This should show verbatim)
//- - - - - - - - -//
![An %%example%% image](https://example.com/image.png)
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p><img src="https://example.com/image.png" alt="An  image"></p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//

105: Comment in a code span
//- - - - - - - - -//
This is a `code %%span%% example`.
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p>This is a <code>code %%span%% example</code>.</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//

106: Comment in a blockquote
//- - - - - - - - -//
> This is a blockquote with a %%comment%%.
//- - - - - - - - -//
<blockquote>
<p>This is a blockquote with a .</p>
</blockquote>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//

107: Comment in a list item
//- - - - - - - - -//
- This is a list item with a %%comment%%.
- Another item.
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li>This is a list item with a .</li>
<li>Another item.</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//
